## delay() function

Returns a promise that will resolve after the given delay, useful for async/await i.e. await delay(100) execute()

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function delay(myDelay: number): Promise<any>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  myDelay | number | The delay to use |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;any&gt;
